EmailTemplate.name: 21_HoneywellForge_BGA_Foreflight-Dispatch-Integrations_Webinar_ON24.1.Invite - h
EmailTemplate.subject: ForeFlight Dispatch Webinar: Next-Gen Flight Planning
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Webinar: Honeywell Forge & ForeFlight Dispatch Integration February 10, 2021 2PM Central
Join us at 10 am Central on Wednesday, February 17 to learn how Honeywell and ForeFlight are collaborating to provide next-generation flight planning and support capabilities for flight departments of all sizes. ForeFlight Dispatch is an integrated flight planning <[[https://bga.honeywellforge.com/ff]]> option for Honeywell Forge customers, offering advanced capabilities and seamless integrations with Honeywell Forge and other services. This webinar will take a close look at these areas of collaboration as well as provide a walkthrough of ForeFlight Dispatch, from viewing and monitoring flight plans to planning, filing, and releasing flights to crew members via ForeFlight Mobile.
The ForeFlight team will also plan two example flights to show how easily Dispatch can handle each use case: Register now <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/02/honeywell-forge-foreflight-dispatch-integration]]>
